Join us to learn more about our legal observer program and how you can help.

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

It's been six years since SCOTUS gutted the Voting Rights Act, making it easier for states and localities to revert back to discriminatory practices that restrict the voting rights of Black, Brown, Native, and Asian American people. It's time we fix this injustice, so we have the tools to effectively combat current racial discrimination in voting.

Restore the VRA
Press Conference and Rally

Join us to show support for the #VRAA and help demand Congress to pass this vital legislation!

Tuesday, AUGUST 6, 12 - 1 p.m.
Robert C Byrd Courthouse
300 Virginia St E
Charleston, WV 25301

Learn More


When our democracy is in peril, so too are our civil rights. We must have a working democracy to make progress on important racial justice issues like educational equity, criminal justice reform, and immigrants' rights. Congress must restore the protections against racial discrimination that the Supreme Court has destroyed so that we can create the truly representative 21st century democracy we deserve. Building a government that is representative of all its people is critical to our ability to solve some of our country's most pressing challenges to improve conditions for us all.

We hope you will join us as we call on Congress to pass the Voting Rights Advance Act.

Onward together,

ACLU of West Virginia
